resources.string:
Rules of Wordle: 
 1) Type a 4-letter word in uppercase format and press submit. 
 2) Green background over the letter indicates that the correct letter in the position. 
 3) Yellow indicates that the letter exist in the word, but it is not in the correct spot. 
 4) Red indicates that the letter does not exist in the word at all. 
 5) You have three tries to get the word. 
 Have fun!
